General.Name: Se Gyung Hi Tech Co.Ltd
General.Description: Se Gyung Hi Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of electronic equipment parts. The company's products include tapes and films attached to smartphones and LCDs. In addition, it engages in the manufacture and sale of printer equipment; and pattern design, mold processing, manufacture, and sale. It primarily sells its products in South Korea, Vietnam, Japan, and China. Se Gyung Hi Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Suwon, South Korea.
